body_html:
I originally tried without success, python complaining about the version.

Though it can work indeed, but ONLY after renaming it to tensorflow_gpu-1.0.1-py3-none-linux_x86_64.whl. Which is what I did in the end after some googling around.

Maybe adding some clarification somewhere?

body:
I originally tried without success, python complaining about the version.

Though it can work indeed, but ONLY after renaming it to `tensorflow_gpu-1.0.1-py3-none-linux_x86_64.whl`. Which is what I did in the end after some googling around.

Maybe adding some clarification somewhere?
